Posts.Content: Canadian_Mama3 wrote: I'm losing my mind waiting for this follow up ultrasound ! I had a routine mammogram a few months ago, and was called in for extra images and an ultrasound. I was told I had a 7mm "complex cyst" in my left breast at the 4:00 position and to follow up in 6 months. Due to my family history, my family doctor asked me to do closer to 4 months. My mother, maternal grandmother and her mother all battled the demon that is breast cancer, and I am terrified. My follow up is next Monday at 8am. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 38 yes old. Complex cyst on left breast. Follow up next Monday Canadian_Mama3 Lolipava
